## TupleKeys type

Get keys of tuple T.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TupleKeys<T extends readonly unknown[]> = T extends readonly [
  any,
  ...infer Tail,
]
  ? TupleKeys<Tail> | Tail['length'] | `${Tail['length']}`
  : never
```
**References:** [TupleKeys](./types-kit.tuplekeys.md)

## Example


```ts
// Expect: 0 | 1 | '0' | '1'
type Keys = TupleKeys<[3, 4]>
```
